Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 47th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Thomas Svoboda (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2015, off Edson Botella (CIN)...
Injured on 8/18/2015 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2017, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/6/2018 to a 5-year deal worth $7,800,000 per year...
